issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ATS Client should retry on intermittent Kerberos issues.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.summary: ATS client should better handle Socket closed case

comments.body: Since trunk and branch-2 diverge on TimelineClientImpl, I've created two patches. We may probably want to focus our review effort on the trunk one, and then before commit we can finalize all changes and apply to branch-2.
